extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    It's class that describe player in the game.

      • run

        public void run()
        It's main method of this class, that unite other methods.
        It allow to launch task of player (Ball) as a thread
        Depending from numOperation thread decide
        in what way move player
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
